definition: Sebta or Ceuta (city in north Morocco)
to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: Hotel Ulises is located in the heart of Ceuta, just a few metres from Ribera Beach.
sentences.chinese: 酒店位於休達的中心，到裏貝拉格蘭海灘只有幾米。
